CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in the Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 30, 1962, pg. 6 reads: Little Rhonda Gail Lloyd is a real glamour girl in the home of her parents, Mr. and Mrs. Ronald Lloyd of 7604 Hamilton Ave.  Here she shows off some of her charm for Courier photographer Charles (Teenie) Harris..."Hoooo Ho! There's nothing like a nap to pep you up on these hot summer afternoons." "
TitMainTitle: Two frames: Woman, possibly Mrs. Ronald Lloyd, holding daughter Rhonda Gail Lloyd in home on 7604 Hamilton Avenue; Rhonda Gail Lloyd, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Ronald Lloyd, wearing light colored outfit with ruffle, posed yawning in home on 7604 Hamilton Avenue
